description.line1: We are an organization that discovers and develops apps that don't exist in the world.
description.line2: Finding infinite ideas from the universe,
description.line3: We aim to create something that doesn't exist yet.

hero.title: Movit
hero.subtitle: Exploration-Based Map App
hero.description: An innovative mobile application that lets you explore the real world and create your own personal map. Using GPS, you illuminate dark areas on the map and record where you've been on your adventures.

exploration.title: Exploration-Based Map Creation
exploration.description: Using GPS, only the places you actually visit are revealed on the map. Create your own unique exploration map.

tracking.title: Real-Time Location Tracking
tracking.description: Precise GPS location tracking unlocks explored areas in real-time. Every step you take is recorded.

privacy.title: Complete Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All data is stored only on your device. No personal information is stored on company servers.

record.title: Personal Exploration Records
record.description: Detailed records of explored distance, time, and newly discovered areas with comprehensive statistics.

download.title: Install Now
download.description: Install Movit now on Android and iOS to start your exploration!

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.line2: Purpleship aims to create services that break existing frameworks.
vision.line3: By implementing apps that only existed in imagination,
vision.line4: Our goal is to provide new experiences.

join.title: Join Us
join.line2: Contact us if you want to explore the unknown universe together.
join.line3: We welcome those who are passionate about discovering new worlds.

hero.title: Stampit
hero.subtitle: Membership Management App
hero.description: A smart mobile application for easily managing prepaid memberships, coupons, and vouchers with limited uses. Manage your complex memberships systematically in one place and never miss tracking your remaining uses.

register.title: Register & Manage Memberships
register.description: Easily register and manage prepaid memberships, vouchers, and coupons in one place.

check.title: Usage Tracking
check.description: Simply check off each visit to record usage and see your remaining count in real-time.

remaining.title: Check Remaining Uses
remaining.description: View remaining uses for each membership at a glance, so you never get confused.

integration.title: Unified Management
integration.description: Manage various types of memberships and vouchers conveniently in one integrated app.

expiry.title: Expiry Notifications
expiry.description: Receive alerts as expiration dates approach, so you never miss using your memberships.

history.title: Usage History
history.description: Check records of when you used which membership and analyze your usage patterns.

download.title: Install Now
download.description: Install Stampit on Android and iOS today to start managing your memberships smarter!

hero.title: Instant memo board for "right now"
hero.description: Create a 6-digit code and share the link so anyone can write and organize in the same space. Start fast with zero setup and wrap up clean when you're done.

qnote.tagline: Create a 6-digit code and share the link so anyone can write and organize in the same space. Start fast with zero setup and wrap up clean when you're done.

section1.title: 1. Purpose of Personal Information Collection and Use
section1.content: Purpleship (hereinafter referred to as "Company") does not currently collect any personal information.
section1.purpose: This website is a static website that simply provides company introduction and information, and does not require the collection or processing of users' personal information.

section2.title: 2. Personal Information Collection Items
section2.no_collection: Purpleship does not currently collect any personal information.
section2.static_content: This website only provides static content and does not request or store users' personal information. There are no membership registration, login, or personal information input functions, and we do not collect information provided by users.

analytics.title: 2.1 Web Analytics Tools
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics for website usage statistics, which only collects anonymized visitor data. No personally identifiable information is collected.

location.title: 2.2 Location Information
location.content: We may request location information in the background to provide app services. Collected location information is processed as follows:
items: Location information is stored only within the user's device (app)
We do not transmit or collect location data to our servers
Backup to the user's Google Drive is only possible upon direct user request
Users can stop using or delete location information at any time

section3.title: 3. Personal Information Retention and Use Period
section3.content: Purpleship does not collect personal information, so there is no separate retention and use period.
section3.analytics: Anonymized data collected by Google Analytics is managed according to Google's privacy policy.

section4.title: 4. Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties
section4.content: The Company does not provide users' personal information to external parties in principle. However, exceptions are made in the following cases:
items: When users have given prior consent
When requested by investigative agencies according to legal procedures and methods for investigation purposes

section5.title: 5. Personal Information Processing Outsourcing
section5.content: The Company may outsource personal information processing tasks to external specialized companies to improve services. When outsourcing, contracts are concluded according to relevant laws and necessary matters for personal information protection are stipulated.

section6.title: 6. Users' Rights
section6.content: Users can exercise the following rights at any time:
items: Request notification of personal information processing status
Request correction and deletion of personal information
Request suspension of personal information processing

section7.title: 7. Technical and Administrative Measures for Personal Information Protection
section7.content: The Company implements the following technical and administrative measures for personal information protection:
items: Minimization and training of personal information processing staff
Designation of personal information protection officer

section8.title: 8. Personal Information Protection Officer
section8.officer: Personal Information Protection Officer: Purpleship Operations Team
section8.report: Processing Status Report: Personal Information Protection Commission (privacy.go.kr)

section9.title: 9. Changes to Privacy Policy
section9.content: This privacy policy is applied from the effective date, and when there are additions, deletions, and corrections of changes according to laws and policies, they will be announced through notices from 7 days before the implementation of changes.
